thread.title: Host Phil Keoghan to be in attendance at the casting call in Santa Clara.
thread.title_full: Host Phil Keoghan to be in attendance at the casting call in Santa Clara.

title: Host Phil Keoghan to be in attendance at the casting call in Santa Clara.
text:
January 31, 2017 at 1:50 pm | UPDATED: January 31, 2017 at 1:57 pm 
Have you ever watched “The Amazing Race” and found yourself yearning to leap off your couch and grab a piece of the action? 
Now here’s your chance: The popular CBS reality series will hold an open casting call Feb. 11 at the Travel & Adventure Show in Santa Clara. 
The auditions will run from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. at the Santa Clara Convention Center (Halls A,B,C,D), 5001 Great America Parkway. 
All participants must pre-register by Feb. 10 by filling out this online form . 
Phil Keoghan, the Emmy-nominated host and producer of “The Amazing Race,” will also speak and hold an autograph-signing session immediately afterward. The casting call and autograph session are sponsored by Taiwan Tourism. 
Contact Chuck Barney at cbarney@bayareanewsgroup.com. Follow him at Twitter.com/chuckbarney and Facebook.com/bayareanewsgroup.chuckbarney.
